_Comments._Mute: force disable notifications (true = yes|false = no|null = depends on call context): Default: true
_Comments._MessageCheckPeriod: how old message to check (in minutes): Default: 15
_Comments._MaxTopChatOutput: how much users can top contain: Default: 20
_Comments._MaxDailyPersonNameLenght: max lenght of name string of daily person in group: Default: 30
_Comments._TheftSumCoefficient: how much the size of the theft sum affects the chance of theft. On 30 it almost doesn't affect: Default: 5 = decreasing by 2 times
_Comments._PartialTheftChance: chance to theft pertial value for 1% (in percents): Default: 30
_Comments._FullTheftChance: chance to theft full value for 1% (in percents): Default: 45
_Comments._TheftCoolDownDuration: duration of cool down for next money theft: Default: 600 = 10min
_Comments._MaxTheftSum: how much can theft per 1 time: Default: 100
_Comments._MaxTransferSum: how much can users transfer: Default: 1000
_Comments._RouletteAnimationDuration: duration of roulette animation (in seconds): Default: 3
_Comments._RouletteMaxBetSum: how much can bet on roulette: Default: 10000
_Comments._StopGameRouletteDelay: time before roulette session is destroyed (in seconds): Default: 300 = 5min
_Comments._MaxNumberHostingCandidates: how many users can participate in the selection of a alias host: Default 10
_Comments._MaxAliasReward: how much the player can get if he guesses the word in the alias game: Default: 50
_Comments._MaxSecondsToGetAliasReward: how long can it take for the player to still get the reward for guessing the word in the alias game (in seconds): Default: 300 = 5min
_Comments._StartAliasGameDelaySeconds: time before alias session is started after last candidate added (in seconds): Default: 5
_Comments._StopAliasGameDelay: time before alias session is destroyed (in seconds): Default: 60 = 1min
